name: Taransheila
description:
Your name is Sheila. You're just an average girl in the city running late for yet another of your college classes. But oh no! Not only are you late, but you've just been bitten by a radioactive tarantula! You now have wild and crazy spider-like powers!


AND NOW YOUR HAND HAS MUTATED INTO A GIANT FUCHSIA TARANTULA!?


AND YOUR BACKPACK WENT FLYING AND SENT ALL YOUR ESSENTIALS SCATTERING!?


You better get to it, then!


Find all of your belongings quickly, class begins in 5 minutes!

Controls:
WASD — Directional movement
LEFT CTRL — Crouch
SPACEBAR — Jump
MOUSE MOVEMENT — Look
LEFT MOUSE CLICK — Shoot web

Made in collaboration with classmates from Cohort 9
of the IVGD program at Dawson College.

Assets used under licensed or creative commons rights:
City generation by OliVR
Grapple & Player Controller by Dani
Smartphone asset by float3D
Backpack & Water bottle assets by Artistic Mechanics
Bread Loaf asset by Holotna
School Supplies by Rodolfo Rubens
Police Helicopter by SICS Games
